channel.title: ocaml on Blogging by Heath™
channel.description: Recent content in ocaml on Blogging by Heath™

item.title: Advent of Code 2024 Notes
item.description: TL;DR - Misc notes from the 2024 Advent of Code in Python and Ocaml and a little bit of Golang. The repo with my solutions to the Advent of Code 2024 problems can be found here. This is a bunch of random notes from this year’s event, no full write-ups or anything for now just general notes and take-aways. Languages Learned a bunch of Ocaml (even though I didn’t use it everyday as intended)
